name: Accelerate Technology Solutions
description:
As an IT consulting company, Accelerate provides custom application development, enterprise solutions, and mobile app services. We implement innovative technology solutions that enable our clients to achieve business objectives while deriving the maximum value from their technology investments.
We have expertise in providing .NET based, OpenSource and custom software applications which also support the evolution of the mobile workforce.

locations.address: 14-03 Tower A Empire Heights, Business Bay
